scripts.build-service: dotnet publish LocalService\LocalService.csproj --self-contained -r win-x64 -o bin\published\LocalService -f netcoreapp3.0
scripts.build-blazorapp: dotnet publish BlazorApp\BlazorApp.csproj --self-contained -r win-x64 -o bin\published\BlazorApp -f netcoreapp3.0
scripts.start: npm run build-service && npm run build-blazorapp && npm run build-ts && electron .
